Term.Name: A - First Page
Term.Notes: First use of jQuery for Mobile Design

Term.Name: B - First Site
Term.Notes: First use of jQuery for Mobile Design on Multiple Pages

Term.Name: 1 - Assignment 1
Term.Notes: Create a four page (one main - three secondary) list driven mobile site using placeholder text and at least three pictures

Term.Name: 2 - Assignment 2
Term.Notes: Create an app that calculates the cost of visiting a theme park. Include elements that add value to the user's experience of working with your app.

Term.Name: 3 - Assignment 3
Term.Notes: Create a single file multiple page proposal for your final project. Include a statement of scope, intended audience, XML driven progress report, and overview of technical use including localStorage.
